resources.string: Welcome to the ADK service testing activity!

This string is really really long so it can be used to test layout areas that may behave strangely when long text is included. Can you still read this text? Did you have to scroll down to see it? Hopefully you can read it all. Normally, that means things are going fairly well. 2nd: This string is really really long so it can be used to test layout areas that may behave strangely when long text is included.
